name: Escape from the Island
description:
This is a super fun casual game, an excellent choice for leisure and entertainment! Games challenge your vision anytime, anywhere, move your fingers, and let you easily experience new fun. Fresh scenes, clear panel design, gorgeous and refreshing special effects, cute and gorgeous game interface, we will definitely accompany you to spend happy leisure time~

Gameplay

Players need to pair and eliminate patterns by observing them on the screen, and the paired patterns must have at least two adjacent identical styles.

You can move the pattern freely (there must be at least two adjacent identical patterns after moving)

Game features

This is a very interesting and challenging game, which not only enhances people's intelligence and reaction ability, but also brings people a relaxed and enjoyable entertainment time. If you haven't played this game yet, come and give it a try! I believe you will definitely fall in love with it.
